snippet: The Port Authority of New York and New Jersey said its Christopher Street station would reopen for weekend service beginning Saturday, from 5 a.m. to 10 p.m.
abstract: New Jersey continues its recovery from Hurricane Sandy, with transit systems continuing to restore services; status of recovery efforts highlighted in chart.
lead_paragraph: The Port Authority of New York and New Jersey said its Christopher Street station would reopen for weekend service beginning Saturday, from 5 a.m. to 10 p.m.

headline.seo: Updates on Services in New Jersey After Hurricane Sandy

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
